password_short_text: 8 to 16 digits including at least one special character and number

instructions.first: To find ID and password or to notify information.
instructions.second: If you are not connected for 6 months from the last access date, monthly account deletion notification emails are sent.
instructions.third: In case of inactivity for 1 year from the last access date, account will be terminated and balance will be confiscated.
